public IRSource(int xx,

Build an IR source with all details.

Parameters:
xx - xx interpolated coordinates.
yy - yy interpolated coordinates.
rxx - raw X coordinate (0-1023).
ryy - raw Y coordinate (0-1023).
si - size of the IR dot (0-15).
